markdownRemark.excerpt: Thought I’d save someone else’s time who’s experiencing this bug: Inside the  file, the  parameter goes outside the  parameter, not inside. ;)
markdownRemark.html:
Thought I’d save someone else’s time who’s experiencing this bug:

module.exports = {
  pathPrefix: `/your-path-prefix-here`,
  siteMetadata: {
    title: ...
  }
  ...
}

Inside the gatsby-config.js file, the pathPrefix parameter goes outside the siteMetadata parameter, not inside. ;)

frontmatter.title: pathPrefix in Gatsby not working?
frontmatter.description: pathPrefix in Gatsby not working? Here's one thing you may have missed...
